summary: The module defines benchmark suites that generate large Quantum Fourier Transform circuits, apply the SABRE swapâ€‘mapping algorithm, and measure execution time, resulting circuit depth, and gate count, as well as the time required to transpile these circuits for an IBMQ backend using Qiskit.
business_intent: To evaluate and quantify the performance and scalability of quantum compilation and mapping tools on sizable QFT workloads, aiding developers and hardware providers in optimizing quantum software pipelines.
